sub_title: EMCC Master (team) Coach and supervisor, TSTA
summary:
Drs Sari van Poelje is a seasoned executive and team coach, trainer-supervisor, and agile business innovation consultant with over 38 years of experience in multinational and family business settings. She is currently the Chairman of the association for executive coaching at Nederlandse Orde van Beroepscoaches (NOBCO), where she is responsible for advancing and promoting the quality and standards of executive coaching in The Netherlands.

She is also the Managing Director of Intact Academy and Team Agility, two companies that offer coaching, consultancy, and training programs for coaches, consultants, and leaders, based on her own Agile Business Innovation design model and Transactional Analysis framework. She is a recognised start-up coach for the European Union, helping entrepreneurs to launch and scale their businesses. She has a passion for facilitating transformational change, inspiring team leadership, and co-creating agile solutions with her clients. She holds multiple credentials and certifications from coaching and psychology associations and institutes, and has authored several books and articles on leadership and change.

treasury_media.title: TEAM COACHING: WHAT IS TEAM COACHING?
treasury_media.description: One of the things I do in Intact Academy is to train team coaches. Team coaches are a little bit of a different animal than executive coaches. In individual coaching you coach in a one on one relationship, where one person is the helper and the other...

projects.title: Roche Pharma
projects.description:
ROCHE Pharma A.G. faces major internal and external challenges. There are three areas of change:
 	Environmental changes:
o	Changes in health care system and regulations
o	Changes in market requires new sales competencies and technologies
 	Product innovation: 
o	Internal product blockbusters off patent in 2014
o	Establishing Roche in new areas e.g. metabolisms and CNS diseases
 	Culture and management development:
o	Develop innovative team leaders
o	Adapt beliefs and value systems
As an organization, ROCHE needs clarity about the scenarios they need to prepare for and about their strengths and development areas to meet the new demands.

projects.title: Smell good
projects.description: International Flavours & Fragrances Inc. is a leading global creator of flavours and fragrances. Consumers experience these unique scents and tastes in fine fragrances and beauty care, detergents and household goods, as well as beverages, confectionery and food products. Given increasing competition and pressure on ingredients prices we were asked to help change the leadership culture and increase performance.

profile_positions.description: We are responsible for professionalising and branding executive coaching in The Netherlands. We organise masterclasses, intermission groups, writer support groups and media for executive coaches.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the association for executive coaching

profile_positions.description: With offices in Utrecht, and associated offices in Genoa, Poznan, Belgrade and Paris, the company offers executive coaching, management consultancy and training programs for coaches, consultants and leaders. We offer 5 ICF TA accredited programs starting with basic TA training, to advanced executive coaching, team coaching, leadership&change and supervision programs.
profile_positions.title: managing director

profile_positions.description: We are specialised in agile business innovation design. In other words we help companies transform their business as quickly as they innovate their products, to decrease time to market. Based on our Agile Business Innovation design model @ we help businesses co-create with customers, create an innovation pipeline, integrate ireal time commercialisation and build an agile structure of cooperation and partnership. Recognised by IODA as top ten most innovative consultants.

profile_positions.company: Dutch Chamber of Commerce in Sweden
profile_positions.description: We organize innovation seminars to facilitate the meeting with and between Dutch entrepreneurs and Swedish businesses
profile_positions.title: regional director Dutch Chamber SE

profile_positions.description:
We are an international consultancy firm with offices in more than 10 countries worldwide. We are all senior business consultants with experience as executives in multinationals.

Our mission is to support sustainable behavioral change in organizations. The way we do our interventions reflects the changes you want to make.

We provide interventions that enable leaders to envision and communicate change efficiently, middle managers to acquire mutual accountability for change and employees to help resolve issues that impede performance.
profile_positions.title: founding partner

profile_positions.description: responsible for worldwide organizational change and leadership development projects
profile_positions.title: senior consultant

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for training, leadership development, career development and succession planning, and performance management world wide (17 countries, 52 locations). Specifically hired to professionalize HR&O function within ASML and to implement E-HR solutions.

Developed and implemented the following major projects:
o	Developed worldwide individual performance management process and application. 
o	Developed and implemented on line corporate university, bringing the number of suppliers down from 1500 to 300 preferred suppliers, and making all courses available through online catalogue and enrollment process. 
o	Developed and implemented worldwide career and succession planning process and application.
profile_positions.title: sr.director development and learning

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all HR&O processes and procedures. Specifically hired to support the merger process between EMI and several other lables, including Virgin and Dino, and to resolve issues within the marketing department.
Developed and implemented the following major projects:
o	Co-developed and implemented merger of three major lables, including manpower planning. CEO went on to become CEO Benelux due to success.
o	Intervened in disfunctioning marketing department, to reinstate leadership and cooperation, through team meetings and coaching sessions. Increase  initiatives to bolster plummeting sales.
o	Developed leadership development curriculum. Led to stable succession planning and increased management competency and employee satisfaction.
